name: Sweetland Quest
description:
After being robbed of a part of himself, Candy Floss decides to go on an adventure across his country, Sweetland, to retrieve it.

We've created Sweetland Quest as part of our Prototyping Games course,
2D Infographic  and Sound Design.

Students in Master Design of Playful Devices at University of Lorraine , we wanted to create a game that resembles us, while remaining accessible to all.
Sweetland Quest was born out of our desire to create a game that is both “cute”, and serious in what he said. The cartoon and «kawaii» universe thus plunges the player in a magical atmosphere, although a little dark from the subject treated. The difficulty is quite high, while keeping some fun and surprise.

A game by : Elisa GAU and Melaine HELLALI
